column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I got the  Champagne Smash to drink
column2: and it was perfectly light and refreshing. To eat
column3: we started off with the Bone Marrow since we always get it at Au Cheval
column4: and it was incredible.  The sweetness of the jam complements the saltiness of bone marrow perfectly. For my meal
column5: I ordered the petite duchess cut filet and it was cooked to perfection.
